articles.author: Gene Maddaus
articles.title: Christopher Nolan Elected President of Directors Guild of America - Variety
articles.description: Christopher Nolan has been elected president of the Directors Guild of America, succeeding Lesli Linka Glatter.
articles.content:
Christopher Nolan has been elected president of the Directors Guild of America, taking over the reins as the union prepares for upcoming negotiations with the major studios.
Nolan, an Oscar winner a… [+2817 chars]
